description: Numbers that are congruent to {3, 4} mod 5.
comments: Also numbers that cannot be expressed as the sum of two 4th powers. - _Cino Hilliard_, Nov 23 2003
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,1,-1).
formula: a(n)=5*n-a(n-1)-3 (with a(1)=3) [From Vincenzo Librandi, Nov 18 2010]G.f. x*(3+x+x^2) / ( (1+x)*(x-1)^2 ). - R. J. Mathar, Oct 08 2011
mathematica: Select[Range[0, 200], MemberQ[{3, 4}, Mod[#, 5]] &] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Feb 12 2012 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
